channel.title: When i Wear An Item, Turns To Something Else? HELP!
channel.description: What Should I Do? I Wear Like Climbing Boots And It Shows Up As A Dragon Chainbody That Im Wearing. And Dragon Boots With White Armour Plate ETC. What Should I Do? What Files Could I Change??

item.title: When i Wear An Item, Turns To Something Else? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Gazascape Gazascape
item.description:
@Gazascape wrote:

No. None of you are correct. All I had to do was correct My equip.txt and thats all.

Read full topic
item.source: When i Wear An Item, Turns To Something Else? HELP!

item.title: When i Wear An Item, Turns To Something Else? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“own master, post:2, topic:394825”][quote author=Gazascape link=topic=492007.msg3597804#msg3597804 date=1305302637]
What Should I Do? I Wear Like Climbing Boots And It Shows Up As A Dragon Chainbody That Im Wearing. And Dragon Boots With White Armour Plate ETC. What Should I Do? What Files Could I Change??
[/quote]
you can’t its in the models of your client[/quote]
Correct, and to be more precise, the item id’s may be the same, check your class8.java or itemdef.java (if your using PI) and check.

Read full topic
